description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE FOR A PROPOSED REAR ROOF EXTENSION WITH 2 X ROOFLIGHTS TO FRONT ROOF SLOPE AND A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations comprising a single storey rear extension would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (Amendment) (No. 2) (England) Order 2008 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations comprising the erection of a rear roof dormer extension would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (Amendment) (No. 2) (England) Order 2008 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations comprising the insertion of 2x rooflights in the front roof slope would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (Amendment) (No. 2) (England) Order 2008 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.
